experience: You and Bruce Randy both know Mark Goldstein, Dru Bloomfield, MS MBA, and 197 others
3850 E Baseline Rd., Ste 119/120    Mesa, AZ 85206

I continuously attend continuing education [CE] classes to stay informed about the latest real estate situation in the SE Valley of the Phoenix Metro Area.    I sit at least 2 open houses a week.    Very interested in working with clients to assist them in finding a home.   I am committed to providing  my clients with professional, personal and outstanding service.   I want my clients to settle for nothing less than the highest integrity, honesty and qualify personal service.    Building on my 10 years as home mortgage processor, I believe I possess skills that can assist my clients through the home buying or selling process in an effective and efficient manner.     I want to help clients find the right home and be satisfied with my services.I am also working to complete Graduate Realtor Institute (GRI) training.
Processed home mortgages, closed approximately 15-20 loans per month.
Associate Administrator and various other managment positions

USDA career began in Decatur County Kansas and ended in Washington DC at the national USDA headquarters.  Held county office management positions in Logan, Grant & Phillips county Kansas; transferred to Washington DC in June 1974; worked various program and managements positions including the Associate Administrator of the Farm Services Agency
Completed numerous correspondence courses; took several management seminars; availed myself of all educational opportunites during my 38-year career with US Department of Agriculture.

Southeast Valley Regional Association of Realtors - SEVRAR

Moderator for SEVRAR Mesa Home Tour, involves putting together a monthly home tour consisting of 20 or more homes listed in ARMLS by realtors and located  in  Gilbert, AZ.      Involves a morning kickoff session  with guest speakers, car pooling to the homes on tour and ending with a lunch.        Involves 15 to 20 hours per month.    Served on Presidential Advisory Group developing operating Guidelines for Marketing Tours; resulting product was adopted and put into effect by the SEVRAR Board of Directors beginning in 2014.   .  Also served as Chairman for the SEVRAR Marketing Tour Committee in 2014 and 2015.
